content.query:
create schema cok_db
go
create external data source json_data
with ( location = 'https://alxkxy5fmpysvavypocws1.blob.core.windows.net/test',
    CREDENTIAL = WorkspaceIdentity );
go
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT parquet_format  
WITH (  
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET  
    );
go
create external table cok_db.json_table
    with (
        LOCATION = 'tab_format/',
        DATA_SOURCE = json_data,
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_format
    )
as
select  JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.SERV_PROV_CODE') AS provider_code,
        JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.B1_PER_ID1') AS b1_per_id1,
        JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.B1_PER_ID2') AS b1_per_id2,
        JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.B1_PER_ID3') AS b1_per_id3,
        JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.WORKLOAD_POINTS') AS wrkld_pts,
        JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.REC_DATE') AS date_recorded,
        JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.REC_FUL_NAM') AS rec_ful_nam,
        JSON_VALUE(doc, '$.REC_STATUS') AS rec_status
from openrowset(
        bulk 'dboBCAPWORKLOAD.txt',
        data_source = 'json_data',
        format = 'csv',
        fieldterminator ='0x0b',
        fieldquote = '0x0b'
    ) with (doc nvarchar(max)) as rows
